entry.title: Sunday: Rain showers or flurries. High 11.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 2100 metres this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
